overview: Jansen Talk about truth, and so on lying. Relationships, politics, raising the children, K3, taxi drivers and transsexuals and the only correct answer to the question "Daddy, Santa Claus is a pedophile?" Jansen lies the truth harder, more beautiful and welgemeender than anyone ever in the history of the Dutch cabaret. And that's really true !!
title: Dolf Jansen: Jansen talks
